page.title: 11LOCAL NEWS IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: This is some local news from our weekly local newspaper{The Kilmarnock {Standard.}We picked 2 important items. 1 Forty years ago this week, 8th May, the war in Europe ended. The people of Kilmarnock have been remembering the Victory in Europe and remembering the celebrations in Kilmarnock on{V.E. Day {1945. 2 A local girl Nancy Nicol disappeared on the 2nd of May. The last person to see her, was our school janitor's daughter. Police are carrying out investigations. (Since this item was written Nancy Nicol has been found murdered and a young man from Troon has been charged with her murder.). {SOME INTERESTING ITEMS FOR SALE ARE: 1 50 unlabelled rose bushes for Â£6 2 A bed settee for Â£150 3 A luxury villa for Â£72,000
